title: To amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and the Fair Housing Act to prohibit discrimination on the basis of affectional or sexual orientation, and for other purposes.
content: Civil Rights Amendments Act of 2003 - Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit discrimination on the basis of affectional or sexual orientation with respect to: (1) public accommodations, (2) public facilities, (3) federally assisted programs, (5) equal employment opportunities, (6) housing sales and rentals, and (7) brokerage services.
